cmp: 车 (car/a vehicle/machine/to shape with a lathe, vehicle on land)

exm.mng: to progress (or increase, change etc) day by day, more (or better etc) with each passing day
progress step by step, gradual progress, to move forward (slowly)
in sequence, step by step (idiom); to make steady progress incrementally
to increase gradually, to build up
gradually proceed, gradually get further apart
